name: zTime (Danger Noodles!)
description: Top down action-survival gameplay becomes a symphony of interweaving 3D paths where the future is visualized along with the present and players have time to change events before it's too late.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: These are the recommended VR specs for zT(DN!).  Works great with lesser specs outside of VR.
